pkgmetadata.longdescription: Publication Bias Tests for Meta-Analysis of Diagnostic Accuracy Test // Generalized Egger tests for detecting publication bias in meta-analysis for diagnostic accuracy test (Noma (2020) doi:10.1111/biom.13343, Noma (2022) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2209.07270). These publication bias tests are generally more powerful compared with the conventional univariate publication bias tests and can incorporate correlation information between the outcome variables.
